description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help guide the none-too-bright hero as he struggles to save the princess by going through the many dungeons set up by the odd - but evil - witch Malice.
description.short: Help guide the none-too-bright hero as he struggles to save the princess by going through the many dungeons set up by the odd - but evil - witch Malice.
